lines.speaker: shopper
lines.text: Hey, is this a vintage store?

lines.speaker: snake
lines.text: Yeah, it's a place where the past comes back to life. Just like Shadow Moses Island.

lines.speaker: shopper
lines.text: Wow, I didn't expect to find you here, Snake!

lines.speaker: snake
lines.text: I'm always around when there's something valuable to protect.

lines.speaker: shopper
lines.text: Snake, I found this amazing mid-century modern chair! What do you think?

lines.speaker: snake
lines.text: Nice find! It's a perfect blend of form and function. Sometimes, even a soldier needs a place to rest.

lines.speaker: snake
lines.text: Remember, a good soldier knows how to adapt to their environment.

lines.speaker: shopper
lines.text: Do you have any advice for finding the best vintage items, Snake?

lines.speaker: snake
lines.text: Stay low, move slowly, and keep your eyes open. You never know what treasures you might find.

lines.speaker: shopper
lines.text: Sounds like a plan! Thanks for the tips, Snake!

lines.speaker: snake
lines.text: No problem. Just remember, it's not about the items you find, but the memories they hold.

lines.speaker: shopper
lines.text: Snake, I just discovered some old records and rare jewelry! This place is incredible!

lines.speaker: snake
lines.text: Each piece has its own story. From gold and silver to diamonds, these items have survived the test of time.

lines.speaker: shopper
lines.text: You're right, Snake. It's fascinating to imagine the history behind these items.

lines.speaker: snake
lines.text: That's the beauty of vintage. Embrace the past, and it'll teach you something about the present.
